item.title: S2AND: Allen AI Paper Summary
item.description: Introduction The purpose of this post is to provide readers a quick recap on the (S2AND paper by Allen AI)[‘https://arxiv.org/pdf/2103.07534.pdf’]. Readers are encouraged to review the original paper for technical details they wish to further investigate. Additionally, Daniel King and Sergey Feldman have done a great job documenting S2AND development in a (separate Medium post)[‘https://blog.allenai.org/s2and-an-improved-author-disambiguation-system-for-semantic-scholar-d09380da30e6’] by Sergey Feldman. For a post demonstrating the implementation of S2AND, feel free to read (the second part)[‘https://google.
